text: Lisbon is an unincorporated community in Howard County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Lisbon was established in 1871, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1906. The community was named after Lisbon, Portugal. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Howard County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Lisbon, Missouri
